A knowledge of rock and popular music will be useful here.
Each picture matches to a clue to form a pair of two-word musical groups with two of the words swapped.
The extraction requires the use of those circles and squares. Notice how the images are all in circles and the clues are in squares.
For each image/clue pair of bands, you will want to take the first letter of one of the four words.
In the order of the images, take the letter indicated by the X from either the band in the image or the corresponding clue.
